projects.title: Wayback References
projects.description: A single page application in React that gets academic URLs and checks whether they were archived by Wayback Machine. Personal project.

projects.title: ABPEducom Publications Portal
projects.description: This site promotes gathering and dissemination of academic digital books about Educommunication and published in open access. I implemented and customized it with PKP/OMP, a PHP-based CMS.

projects.title: II International Congress on Communication and Education
projects.description: A hotsite made with Site Origin Builder and WordPress. I was responsible for design and full-stack development.
